channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 刑務所からNYT地方調査フェロー、ウィスコンシン・ウォッチ記者になるまで、大学のジャーナリズムの授業がどのように役立ったかを語る記者（マリオ・コーラン/ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
Mario Koran / New York Times:
A reporter describes how college journalism classes helped him go from being in jail to becoming a NYT Local Investigations Fellow and Wisconsin Watch reporter  —  While serving a sentence for burglary, I enrolled in a college journalism class.  When I interviewed my correctional officer, my world broadened.

item.title: サウジアラビアがEsports World Cupを開催するにあたり、「スポーツウォッシング」に対する懸念に注目。サウジアラビアのPIFは大手ゲーム会社を買収している（Ben Church/CNN）
item.description:
Ben Church / CNN:
A look at concerns about Saudi Arabia “sportswashing” as it hosts the Esports World Cup; Saudi Arabia's PIF has bought some of the biggest gaming companies  —  In the heart of Saudi Arabia's capital, a seismic moment for esports is underway; one which has triggered both excitement and concern across the industry.

item.title: サウジアラビアが出資し、リヤドで開催された第1回Esports World Cupは、1,500人以上のゲーマーが参加し、賞金総額は6,000万ドル以上となった。
item.description:
Bloomberg:
A look at the inaugural Esports World Cup, a multi-genre tournament in Riyadh funded by Saudi Arabia, featuring 1,500+ gamers and a record $60M+ prize pool  —  - Esports World Cup has record prize pool of $60 million  — Crown Prince MBS wants to build esports capital in Riyadh

item.title: バイデン補佐官は、7月3日にフィラデルフィアのWURDのThe Source、7月4日にウィスコンシンのWAUKのThe Earl Ingram Showのラジオ・インタビューに質問を提供した（マイケル・D・シアー/ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙）。
item.description:
Michael D. Shear / New York Times:
Biden aides provided questions for radio interviews on The Source on Philadelphia's WURD, on July 3, and The Earl Ingram Show on Wisconsin's WAUK, on July 4  —  The host of “The Source” on WURD in Philadelphia said officials provided her with a list of eight questions to choose from.

item.title: ディスカバリーの投資家、ワーナー・メディアとの430億ドルの合併で内部関係者が10億ドル以上の不適切な利益を得たとの主張について1億2500万ドルの和解に達する（Jef Feeley/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Jef Feeley / Bloomberg:
Discovery investors reach a $125M settlement over claims that company insiders reaped improper benefits worth $1B+ in its $43B merger with WarnerMedia  —  - Settlement involves payment by Advance/Newhouse partnerships  — Merger created one of world's largest entertainment companies

item.title: 中国のソーシャルメディア上で、日本、米国、ユダヤ人などに向けられた排外主義的なコンテンツが、検閲にもかかわらず、どのように議論の対象となり、広まっていったか（Li Yuan/New York Times）
item.description:
Li Yuan / New York Times:
How xenophobic content on Chinese social media, directed towards Japan, the US, Jews, and others, became the subject of a debate and spreads despite censorship  —  Violent attacks on foreigners have prompted a debate about extreme nationalism online in a country that heavily censors information the government bans.

item.title: ElevenLabs、映画、ポッドキャスト、インタビューのポストプロダクション用に音声ファイルからバックグラウンドノイズを除去するフリーミアムAIツール「Voice Isolator」を発表（Shubham Sharma/VentureBeat）
item.description:
Shubham Sharma / VentureBeat:
ElevenLabs launches Voice Isolator, a freemium AI tool for removing background noise from audio files for film, podcast, and interview post production  —  ElevenLabs, the AI voice startup known for its voice cloning, text-to-speech and speech-to-speech models, has just added another tool to its product portfolio: an AI Voice Isolator.

item.title: バイデンがABCニュースの単独インタビューに応じ、体力に関する質問に反論した（Alexandra Hutzler/ABC News）。
item.description:
Alexandra Hutzler / ABC News:
Biden gives a rare one-on-one interview to ABC News, pushing back against questions about his fitness, after about a month of heavy media focus on his age  —  : Speaking with George Stephanopoulos, he dismissed concerns about mental fitness.  —  President Joe Biden speaks with George Stephanopoulos …

item.title: 2023年8月、カンザス州紙への警察の家宅捜索をめぐる訴訟の一部を和解するため、23万5000ドルを受け取ることに同意した元マリオン郡記録紙記者デブ・グルーバー（John Hanna/Associated Press）
item.description:
John Hanna / Associated Press:
Former Marion County Record reporter Deb Gruver agrees to accept $235,000 to settle part of her lawsuit over a police raid on the Kansas paper in August 2023  —  A former reporter for a weekly Kansas newspaper has agreed to accept $235,000 to settle part of her federal lawsuit over a police raid …

item.title: ハリウッドのメディア大手は、半年時点でディズニーとフォックスを除いて2桁の株価下落となっており、2024年も水面下で推移する可能性が高い（Cynthia Littleton/Variety）
item.description:
Cynthia Littleton / Variety:
At the half-year mark, Hollywood media giants have had double-digit stock price declines, except Disney and Fox, and will likely stay underwater in 2024  —  Disney and Fox Corp. buck the downtrend for showbiz shares at the midyear mark  —  As always, the numbers tell the tale.

item.title: ドイツ政府は、早ければ2025年1月から30％の映画／TV制作税制優遇措置を追加することを公約、オーストラリアは7月1日にリベートを30％に引き上げ（Scott Roxborough/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Scott Roxborough / The Hollywood Reporter:
Germany's government pledges to add a 30% film/TV production tax incentive, effective as early as January 2025; Australia raised its rebate to 30% on July 1  —  German studios have been pushing for the incentive, which they say is necessary to remain competitive in attracting international productions.

item.title: テキストに重点を置き、ユーザーにとって明確な目的がないため、Threadsにインフルエンサーを集めるのに苦労しているMetaの様子（Taylor Lorenz/Washington Post）
item.description:
Taylor Lorenz / Washington Post:
A look at Meta's struggles to attract influencers to Threads, due to the platform's focus on text and its lack of a clear purpose for users  —  Threads launched a year ago Friday but has a fraction of the users of Meta's other platforms.  Content creators say they don't consider it important.

item.title: ポーランド国営放送がドナルド・トゥスク首相が "誤解を招く "非難をしたとする記事を削除、トゥスク首相は放送局を脱政治化していないとの主張を裏付ける（Daniel Tilles/Notes From Poland）
item.description:
Daniel Tilles / Notes From Poland:
Polish state broadcaster deletes an article that said PM Donald Tusk made “misleading” accusations, supporting claims that Tusk hasn't depoliticized the outlet  —  Poland's state broadcaster, TVP, has deleted an article from its website that found Prime Minister Donald Tusk to have made …

item.title: YouTube、クリエイター向け「Erase Song」ツールを更新、AIアルゴリズムで著作権保護された音楽を検出し、他の音声に影響を与えずに動画から削除（Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Ivan Mehta / TechCrunch:
YouTube updates its Erase Song tool for creators with an AI algorithm to detect and remove any copyrighted music from their videos without impacting other audio  —  On July 4, YouTube released an updated eraser tool for creators so they can easily remove any copyrighted music …

item.title: サッカーメディア『フットボルコ』の北米CEOジェイソン・ワゲンハイムに、編集スタッフの拡大、ライフスタイル・ブランドから学ぶことなどについてインタビュー（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
An interview with soccer media company Footballco's North America CEO Jason Wagenheim on expanding its editorial staff, learning from lifestyle brands, and more  —  Footballco's first CEO for North America is enjoying the “luxury” of setting up a “really big, massive important business” …
